meanings.sent1: The purposed event was a success.
meanings.sent2: She wore a purposed smile to the party.
meanings.sent3: The purposed surprise party was almost ruined by a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: His purposed journey to self-discovery led him to unexpected places.
meanings.sent5: The purposed decision to start a new business changed her life forever.

meanings.definition: Having a specific aim or goal
meanings.sent1: Their purposed mission was to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent2: The purposed project deadline was approaching fast.
meanings.sent3: The purposed bake sale aimed to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: Her purposed focus on her studies paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent5: The purposed goal of running a marathon kept him motivated to train every day.
